title: The Stone's Embrace
goal: Introduce Kaelen's awakening and disorientation, establish the changed world and his fragmented memories.

beats.summary: Kaelen awakens in a forgotten, ancient sanctuary, disoriented and weak, with no memory of how he came to be there.
He experiences fragmented, unsettling visions of a cataclysmic past and a creeping darkness.
Kaelen struggles to understand his surroundings, finding ancient symbols and technology he barely recognizes, hinting at vast time passage.
